Find us: Home > Diet > Special Diets > Diabetes Diet > DASH Diet Ranked Best Diet Here’s Why DASH Diet Ranked Best Diet Here’s Why By FYI Health Writer on Jun 07, 2011 Tweet FYI Health Tip
DASH is a diet that is low fat and low sodium, while emphasizing a higher intake of fruits, vegetables and fiber.
